title: Siblings
description: Due to the mature nature of this material only readers over the age of 18 should view and/or purchase this book.Sebastian “Bash” Morrison is an aspiring rock star and the brother Damian Stone never knew he had. But when he and his band head to New York City he struggles to write his own material until he finds a muse in Skyler, a beautiful model with connections to his family. When Skyler first sets her eyes on the rock star, she knows she should run in the opposite direction but Skyler is drawn to Sebastian in a way she can’t explain. Against her better judgment she takes a chance on him and decides to give her search for love one more try. Will Skyler finally find true romance in the rock star or is Bash just one more wrong place for her to look for love?
author: Kitty Berry
